mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (name, paternalSurname, maternalSurname, registrationDate, cellphoneNumber, password, oneTimePassword) VALUES (#{name}, #{paternalSurname}, #{maternalSurname}, #{registrationDate}, #{cellphoneNumber}, #{password}, #{oneTimePassword})
mapper.select: SELECT idUser, name, paternalSurname, maternalSurname, cellphoneNumber, password FROM user WHERE cellphoneNumber = #{cellphoneNumber} AND password = #{password} AND active = (1)
